name: Moonfall Covenant
shortDescription: The Moonfall Covenant are militant devotees of the broken moon's memory, wielding silver flame and sacred song to purge corruption. Clad in scorched relic-plate and marked by holy burns, they deliver both salvation and annihilation in equal measure. Their war is not for territory â€” it is for cleansing.
description: The Moonfall Covenant draws its power from the shattered remains of a fallen moon. Their warriors are marked by lunar scars that pulse with cold light, and they wield weapons forged from moon-metal that can cut through reality itself.

equipment.name: Moon-Metal Blade
equipment.description: A weapon that can phase through solid matter.

equipment.name: Lunar Armor
equipment.description: Armor that glows with cold moonlight and provides protection against void energies.

equipment.name: Void Crystal
equipment.description: A focus for channeling lunar powers.

branches.name: Order of the Lunar Blade
branches.description: Specializes in moon-metal weaponry and combat techniques.

branches.name: Cult of the Void
branches.description: Studies and harnesses the power of the void between stars.

branches.name: Lunar Seers
branches.description: Mystics who interpret the patterns of the fallen moon.

factionRules.name: Ashen Communion
factionRules.description: At the start of a unit's activation, if there are at least two other friendly Moonfall Covenant units within 3" of it, the unit becomes Illumed until the start of its next activation.

factionRules.name: Illumed (Condition)
factionRules.description: This unit scores Critical Triggers on a roll of 5+.

factionRules.name: Moonseared (Condition)
factionRules.description:
An enemy unit with the Moonseared Condition is treated as a friendly Moonfall Covenant unit for the Ashen Communion Special Rule.
At the start of the turn, remove all Moonseared Conditions.
